about_the_game:
Transform the world of Faerûn with the official Baldur's Gate 3 Toolkit. Designed for modders, this engine provides you with all you need to bring your vision to life.

With this engine, you can:
  • Create your own mods and publish them: Share your creations with the world and join a vibrant community of creators.
  • Create new class and subclasses: Develop and introduce new character classes and subclasses.
  • Make new spells: Design powerful new spells and magical abilities, or simply make all fireballs neon pink.
  • Create new dice skins: Customize your game with unique and personalized dice designs.
  • Add new weapons/armour: Expand your game’s arsenal with original weapons and armour.
  • Make scripting changes: Use Osiris, our scripting language, to define reactions to player and NPC states and actions, like attacking, using, and moving things.
  • ...And much more!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.
